alert.note: Alert for West Slopes North Cascades and Passes; West Slopes North Central Cascades and Passes (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued October 23 at 3:24PM PDT until October 25 at 5:00PM PDT by NWS Seattle
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM TUESDAY TO 5 PM PDT WEDNESDAY ABOVE 3000 FEET... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected above 3000 feet. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 15 inches above 3000 feet and 12 to 24 inches above 5000 feet. * WHERE...Cascade mountains of Whatcom and Skagit Counties, including the Mount Baker Ski Area. Cascade mountains of Snohomish and King Counties, including Stevens Pass and Snoqualmie Pass. * WHEN...From 11 AM Tuesday to 5 PM PDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Difficult travel conditions possible at times across the mountain passes. Early season snowfall could make outdoor recreation difficult.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.

area.areaDesc: West Slopes North Cascades and Passes; West Slopes North Central Cascades and Passes
